entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with rain early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
